thread.title: Man charged with fraud over false promotions for Mark Ronson show in Scarborough
thread.title_full: Man charged with fraud over false promotions for Mark Ronson show in Scarborough

title: Man charged with fraud over false promotions for Mark Ronson show in Scarborough
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Man charged with fraud over false pro... Man charged with fraud over false promotions for Mark Ronson show in Scarborough Next Story Prev Story 1 min ago Read more: ABC News 
Western Australia's Major Fraud Squad has charged a man who promoted a Mark Ronson performance in Perth which never happened. Police allege the man entered into a contractual arrangement with the Matisse Beach Club in Scarborough for the British musician and producer to appear at a Winter Funk Fest on July 25. But Ronson was performing at Splendour In The Grass at Byron Bay on July 24, and had already played at Metro City in Perth two days earlier.   ABC News.
